description: Haththotuwa Gamage Chinthaka and another Vs Hon. Attorney General before HON. WICKUM A. KALUARACHCHI, J
parties: Haththotuwa Gamage Chinthaka and another Vs Hon. Attorney General
keywords: Unsuggested defence version cannot be accepted. Defence succeeds if the dock statement creates a reasonable doubt. Burden of proof in a criminal case. Weakness of the defence is not a reason for the prosecution to succeed. Identification of the accused by voice.
legistation: Section 357 of the Penal Code read with Section 32. Section 364 (2) of the Penal Code. Explanation-1 to section 364 of the Penal Code.
